alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 2:41AM MST until December 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with locally higher amounts on favored aspects. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
